sentences.sContent: A weasel word is a modifier that almost contradicts the claim that is made.
sentences.sContent_eng: A weasel word is a modifier that almost contradicts the claim that is made.

synos.tran: [助剂]改性剂；[语]修饰语；修正的人

trans.tranOther: a word or group of words that gives additional information about another word. Modifiers can be adjectives (such as ‘fierce’ in ‘the fierce dog’), adverbs (such as ‘loudly’ in ‘the dog barked loudly’), or phrases (such as ‘with a short tail’ in ‘the dog with a short tail’).
